items.sentence: Tom thought Mary was lying about where she\'d been.
There are only just a few passengers on that train.
There were lots of happy kids in the swimming pool.
This is where Tom said that he buried the treasure.
I gained back the weight I\'d lost over the summer.
No one is in a better position to do that than Tom.
No one pays attention to anything Tom says anymore.
Nobody told me that it was going to cost this much.
Tom talked Mary into going to the concert with him.
Tom took off his socks and threw them on the floor.
